Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking casually down Overland Drive, admiring the scenery.
Room.LongDescription: Although there is not much to see around here, the rural atmosphere of the region is pleasant if not relaxing. To the south, you can see the extend of the city's boundaries. The large City Wall looms to the south of Golden Dolphin Way. Oceancrest is surrounded by a large City Wall to protect the citizens from both internal and external threats.
